fields.description:
The "ti i18n" command provides the ability to extract strings from source code and generate native i18n files.

h4. Extracting Strings

The "extract" subcommand will locale all calls to the i18n functions {{L()}} and {{Ti.Locale.getString()}}. The strings can either be output as .json to stdout or a file or appended to the native i18n string files for the language defined by the {{--language}} option (defaults to "en").

This subcommand replaces {{alloy i18n-extract}}.

h4. Generate i18n Files

The "generate" subcommand will take a .json file and append them to the native i18n files for the language defined by the {{--language}} option. This is based on TIMOB-18577.
